name: STEALTH: The Game
description:
This is a (maybe) in development game about STEALTH! Everyone's favorite.

Controls:

arrow keys or gamepad left stick to move

space or the A button to interact where applicable

f to do/undo fullscreen

How to win:

Pretty bare bones at the moment. Simply get all the keycards, green, red, and purple.

I hope you enjoy, old sport!

Feedback recommendations:

Let me know if you enjoyed the game, hated it, and why

let me know if the game MYSTERIOUSLY CRASHES for some mysterious reason

let me know if you died a bunch, maybe too much

let me know what parts were the most enjoyable

or don't! It's up to you.
